\subsubsection[kmPlaneClassifyPoint]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}{\bf POINT\_\-CLASSIFICATION} kmPlaneClassifyPoint (const {\bf kmPlane} $\ast$ {\em pIn}, \/  const {\bf kmVec3} $\ast$ {\em pP})}}
\label{plane_8h_8a74a1d649bcd7438e83e38d8b1640a0}


Returns POINT\_\-INFRONT\_\-OF\_\-PLANE if pP is infront of pIn. Returns POINT\_\-BEHIND\_\-PLANE if it is behind. Returns POINT\_\-ON\_\-PLANE otherwise
